data.title: Hammerhead Carcharion
data.text:
Hammerhead Carcharions are slightly smaller than the Great White Carcharion subrace and are distinguished by their hammer-like head, similar to that of Hammerhead sharks. They tend to be the more agile of the Carcharions and often take home in vast expanses of coral. Player character Hammerhead Carcharion have the features detailed opposite in addition to the ones they get from being Carcharion.

Hammerhead Carcharions around the Azure Sea

Used as advanced scouts by Carcharion hunting parties due to their excellent all-round vision and perception skills, Hammerhead Carcharion tend to be more widely accepted in other cultures (though still rare in land-based cultures), perhaps because of their slightly humorous appearance. They should not be underestimated however, as they are quick and agile.

Hammerhead Carcharion by Video1313

Hammerhead Carcharion

Ability Score Increase +1 Dex

Size Medium

Speed 25 ft., swim 35 ft.

Headbutt. You can use your hammer-like head as a blunt weapon as an Attack action. If you hit with your head, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4+ your Strength Modifier. The target must make a Strength Check of 10 + your Proficiency Bonus or become knocked Prone.
